byline.contributor: Suhasini Raj reported from New Delhi, and Ellen Barry from Bangalore, India.
byline.original: By SUHASINI RAJ and ELLEN BARRY

abstract: Police in India arrest Kashmiri engineer Tauseef Ahmad Bhat and charge him with sedition based on Facebook content he posted or shared calling for India to withdraw from Himalayan region of Kashmir; arrest was prompted by members of right-wing Hindu activist group who noticed posts.
lead_paragraph: Tauseef Ahmad Bhat, 29, was accused of “liking, sharing and posting anti-India content on Facebook,” a police official said.
snippet: Tauseef Ahmad Bhat, 29, was accused of “liking, sharing and posting anti-India content on Facebook,” a police official said....

headline.main: Kashmiri Faces Sedition Charges Over Facebook Activity
headline.print_headline: India Accuses Man of Sedition for Using Facebook to Urge Pullout From Kashmir
